MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH3 postcode area of  Tattenhall affecting properties in Aldersley Lane, Aldersley Park, Back Lane and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still without power. Our engineers are on site and repairs are taking longer than expected because of a grounded overhead line conductor and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12 midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:50AM 1st April 2021
